column1: The Pit Room////Pit Room has decent everything that we tried - brisket
column4: and pork ribs.  They do the beef rib pretty well
column5: but it's not as good as Hometown in NYC or La BBQ in Austin.  Same goes with the pork ribs.  The side of Mac and cheese are among the best we've had at BBQ places.  Their beans are good
column6: but not as good as say Fette Sau in NYC.
